alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hardee, southern Manatee and Sarasota Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 1000 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakewood Ranch to 22 miles southwest of Saint Armands Key. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Sarasota, Bradenton, Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Myakka City, Ridge Wood Heights, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, South Bradenton, and Vamo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
